bibl.title: Historians and the Papyri on the Finances of Egypt at the Arab Conquest.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: El Abbadi, Mostafa

bibl.note: Of the total revenue of gold ca 25% was sent to the imperial treasury, either in Constantinople, Medina or Damascus.
El Abbadi Mostafa, Historians and the Papyri on the Finances of Egypt at the Arab Conquest.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 509-516.
